ARABIC: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Better is the Night of Determination than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Worship) on the Night of Destiny is better than (worship) for a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Night of Al-Qadr is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The grand night is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The night of Power is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The Night of Ordainment is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The night of Al-Qadr (Decree) is better than a thousand months (i.e. worshipping Allah in that night is better than worshipping Him a thousand months, (i.e. 83 years and 4 months).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Night of Honor is better than a thousand months,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [97:3] The Night of Ordainment is better than a thousand months, in which there is no Night of Ordainment, for a righteous deed on that Night is better than one [performed] for a thousand months without it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He then explained its merit by saying: (The Night of Power is better than a thousand months) He says: works in this night are better than works performed in 1,000 months which do not include such a night.
